name: Codemakers! Test Build Two
description: this is the test build of Codemakers! an upcoming indie game by yours truly! you live in a world of code you must save, by going into simulations and taking fragments, bringing them back to fix the world, with many planned sidemissions, sidegames, and rougelike, co op fun! (Co Op Servers not prepped as of 1/15/21)
